dcterms:creator: Espen Bernton
Jeremy Heng
Arnaud Doucet
Pierre E Jacob
dcterms:description: Dataset used for sampling from a class of probability distributions with Gaussian tails, utilizing the Schrödinger bridge framework.
dcterms:title: Schrödinger bridge samplers

dcterms:creator: Sebastian Reich
dcterms:description: Dataset related to data assimilation viewed through the lens of the Schrödinger perspective, providing insights into the integration of data and models.
dcterms:title: Data assimilation: The Schrödinger perspective

dcterms:creator: Christian Léonard
dcterms:description: A survey dataset that explores the Schrödinger problem and its connections with optimal transport, providing theoretical insights.
dcterms:title: A survey of the Schrödinger problem and some of its connections with optimal transport

dcterms:creator: Yongxin Chen
Tryphon T Georgiou
Michele Pavon
dcterms:description: Dataset focused on the optimal steering of linear stochastic systems to achieve a final probability distribution.
dcterms:title: Optimal steering of a linear stochastic system to a final probability distribution, part i

dcterms:creator: Yongxin Chen
Tryphon T Georgiou
Michele Pavon
dcterms:description: Continuation of the previous dataset, focusing on further aspects of optimal steering in linear stochastic systems.
dcterms:title: Optimal steering of a linear stochastic system to a final probability distribution—part iii

dcterms:creator: Eric Vanden-Eijnden
Jonathan Weare
dcterms:description: Dataset for rare event simulation of small noise diffusions, providing methodologies for handling rare events in stochastic processes.
dcterms:title: Rare event simulation of small noise diffusions

dcterms:creator: Carsten Hartmann
Lorenz Richter
Christof Schütte
Wei Zhang
dcterms:description: Dataset providing a variational characterization of free energy, including theoretical foundations and algorithms.
dcterms:title: Variational characterization of free energy: Theory and algorithms

dcterms:creator: Wei Zhang
Han Wang
Carsten Hartmann
Marcus Weber
Christof Schütte
dcterms:description: Dataset detailing applications of the cross-entropy method to importance sampling and optimal control of diffusions.
dcterms:title: Applications of the cross-entropy method to importance sampling and optimal control of diffusions

dcterms:creator: Danilo Jimenez Rezende
Shakir Mohamed
dcterms:description: Dataset focused on variational inference techniques utilizing normalizing flows, providing a framework for efficient inference.
dcterms:title: Variational inference with normalizing flows

dcterms:creator: Michele Pavon
Esteban G Tabak
Giulio Trigila
dcterms:description: Dataset presenting the data-driven approach to the Schrödinger bridge, offering insights into practical applications.
dcterms:title: The data-driven Schrödinger bridge
